--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, Derek James <djames@g...> wrote:
> Hi,
> 
> This is the other half of the ANJI team.
> 
> I believe if you just set the following two properties the 
following ways:
> 
> initial.topology.fully.connected=false
> initial.topology.num.hidden.neurons=0
> 
> That should start with an intial topology with only input and output
> neurons, with no connections.  Philip can correct me if that isn't
> right, but go ahead and give it a try. :)
> 
> Derek
> 


Thanks, Derek.  I'll give that a try and let you know how it works 
out.

Brett
